reasoning: Adenocarcinoma comprises >90% of colorectal cancers. Global colorectal cancer incidence from GLOBOCAN 2005 is approximately 30 per 100k; adenocarcinoma represents the primary histological subtype at ~28.5 per 100k.
source: Parkin DM et al. (2005). Global cancer statistics, 2002. CA Cancer J Clin. 55(2):74-108
